awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Arithmetic Groups, P-adic Groups and Representation Theory
awd_abstract_narration: This project is concerned with two related problems in the                 representation theory of p-adic groups.  One is concerned with                  finding invariants of certain compact open subgroups in admissible              representations of reductive groups over local fields.  The other               is concerned with the relationship between the Steinberg module of              an algebraic Q-group, and the cohomology of its arithmetic                      subgroups.                                                                           This research is in the area of representation theory of                   p-adic groups.  The principal investigator will try to find                     invariants which measure certain properties of these groups.  This              work would have important implications for the theory of                        automorphic forms.  It will be of interest to algebraists and                   number theorists alike.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
